Desc.entry: Internet access points available for the public to use. No registration or personal details are required to use. If printing or assistance is required, First Point staff are available. Cost of printing is 10p per sheet. Services include archived planning applications which are not available on the council website as well as a wide range of public sector websites. Unfortunately no storage is available for the use of personal storage media or word processing.

category.entry: INTERNET CAFES AND CITY CENTRE INTERNET ACCESS
